text: Smarana kara [1], yakhana tini tamra paksa theke sbastira jan'ya tomaderake tandraya acchanna karena [2] ebam akasa theke tomadera upara brsti barsana karena yate era madhyame tini tomaderake pabitra karena [3], ara tomadera theke sayatanera kumantrana dura karena, tomadera hrdayasamuha drrha rakhena ebam era madhyame tomadera pa- samuha sthira rakhena
